You're a pretty quiet person who likes to keep things chill.
You can easily get overwhelmed by busy environments, and are much more comfortable when things are more tranquil.
You also tend to keep your emotions in check, and aren't too keen on reacting to things strongly.
While everyone else is cheering in celebration, you might give a thankful smile instead.
This can sometimes lead others to see you as being a bit detached and emotionless...
...but the truth is that you show your care and appreciation in your own less visible way.
A calm person like you will be...
